CustomField.description: Field used in List views for visual representation of Priority value
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Priority) = '4' || TEXT(Priority) = '5', IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"), IF ( TEXT(Priority) = '3', IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red")))
CustomField.label: Priority
